Ogden.Dee Events Center:
Dee Events Center is a multi-purpose indoor arena in the western United States, located in Ogden, Utah. The circular, 11,592-seat domed arena, similar in design to many of the era, opened 41 years ago in 1977 and was named for the Lawrence T. Dee family, for his extensive contributions in building the arena.
It is the largest arena in Utah north of Salt Lake City and is home to the Weber State University Wildcats men's and women's basketball teams.
